definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
pituitary glands (at the base of the skull)

sentences.english: His eyes drooped even as he spoke.
sentences.chinese: 当他说的时候，他的眼睛甚至下垂。

sentences.english: What happened to the 'drooping eyelids' and the wrinkle lines?
sentences.chinese: 那下垂的眼皮和沟纹哪里去了？

sentences.english: Is not the colored glaze semi-annular jade pendant?
sentences.chinese: 不色的釉是否是半环型玉下垂？

sentences.english: When the patient shuts up, buccinator is very flabby, reason quarrel is flagging.
sentences.chinese: 患者闭嘴时，颊肌极为松弛，故口角下垂。

sentences.english: The hypothalamus controls hormone secretions from the nearby pituitary gland.
sentences.chinese: 下丘脑控制附近脑下垂体分泌激素。

sentences.english: The king is captivated by your tresses .
sentences.chinese: 王被这下垂的发绺监禁了。

sentences.english: Moola bandha is also excellent for treating prolapse, leucorrhoea and urinary (stress) incontinence.
sentences.chinese: 会阴收束对治疗下垂，白带及尿失禁同样成效显著。

sentences.english: Adjustable droop makes load sharing between engines precise.
sentences.chinese: 可调下垂，使负载共享之间的发动机，准确的。

sentences.english: Lips well developed but not pendulous giving a clean finish.
sentences.chinese: 嘴唇发达但不下垂，末端干净利落。

sentences.english: Methods The kidney fixation was used to treat nephroptosis by means of the pedicled muscle psoas major with muscle film petal.
sentences.chinese: 方法采用带蒂腰大肌肌膜瓣行肾固定手术治疗肾下垂。

sentences.english: Lips square, but not pendulous or showing prominent flews .
sentences.chinese: 嘴唇呈四方形，但不下垂，也没有夸张的上唇。

sentences.english: To twist(the hair, for example) into ringlets or coils.
Maybe she is just young enough so that everything is still poiting up.
sentences.chinese: 那也许是她够年轻，所以一切还没有下垂。

definition: to bend/to curve around/curved/crooked/to wind/to warp
